insert into label_info (`type`, `name`, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{item.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into label_info
id,
`type`, `name`, create_time, update_time, is_deleted,
values

#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
on duplicate key update
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
